RestConnector.Title: Metrics
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns key statistics for the target.

JsonPath.HelpText: Aim of the request: root domain, host, or URL
Total number of live backlinks
Number of unique domains linking to a target
Number of unique subnets / C-blocks linking to a target
Number of unique IPs linking to a target

JsonPath.Title: NoFollow Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks marked as nofollow with a rel='nofollow' attribute inthe a tag or robots meta tag

JsonPath.Title: DoFollow Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks NOT marked as nofollow with a rel='nofollow' attribute in the a tag or robots meta tag

JsonPath.Title: EDU Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks coming from .edu domains

JsonPath.Title: GOV Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks coming from .gov domains

RestConnector.Title: InLink Rank
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns information about the InLink Rank and Domain InLink Rank for a target URL.

JsonPath.HelpText: Aim of the request: URL of the page you are getting InLink Rank for

JsonPath.Title: InLink Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: InLink Rank (Page Authority) of the referring page's URL

JsonPath.Title: Domain InLink Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain InLink Rank (Domain Authority) of the referringpage's root domain

RestConnector.Title: Backlinks

JsonPath.Title: URL From

JsonPath.Title: Url To
JsonPath.HelpText: Destination page's URL
Referring page's title
Link anchor text for text links and image alt text for image links

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: The date when the backlink was discovered and added to the index

JsonPath.Title: Last Visited
JsonPath.HelpText: The date when our crawlers last visited the referring page

JsonPath.Title: InLink Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: InLink Rank (Page Authority) of the referring page's URL

RestConnector.Title: RefDomains
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns information about the domains/hosts pointing to a target.

JsonPath.HelpText: Name of the referring domain

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: The date when the oldest live backlink coming from this domain was found
Total number of backlinks pointing to the target from this domain

JsonPath.Title: DoFollow Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks from this domain that are NOT marked as nofollow with a rel='nofollow' attribute in the a tag or robots meta tag

JsonPath.Title: Domain InLink Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain InLink Rank (Domain Authority) of the referring domain

RestConnector.Title: New/Lost Backlinks
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of backlinks (newly) found or lost within the specified date range for the specified target.

JsonPath.Title: URL From
JsonPath.HelpText: Referring page's URL

JsonPath.HelpText: Destination page's URL
Referring page's title
Link anchor text for text links and image alt text for image links

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: The date when the backlink was discovered and added to the index

JsonPath.Title: New/Lost Date
JsonPath.HelpText: The date when the link was found or lost

Type of backlink

RestConnector.Title: New/Lost RefDomains
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of referring domains, at least one backlink from which was (newly) found or lost in the specified date range for the specified target.

JsonPath.HelpText: Name of the referring domain

JsonPath.Title: First Seen
JsonPath.HelpText: The date when the oldest live backlink coming from this domain was found

JsonPath.Title: New/Lost Date
JsonPath.HelpText: The date when the oldest live backlink coming from this domain was found or the last backlink from this domain was lost.
Indicates whether the backlink is new or lost
Total number of backlinks pointing to the target from this domain

JsonPath.Title: DoFollow Backlinks
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of backlinks NOT marked with rel nofollow attribute value in the a tag or robots meta tag pointing from this domain.

JsonPath.Title: Domain InLink Rank
JsonPath.HelpText: Domain InLink Rank (Domain Authority) of the referring domain

JsonPath.HelpText: Current status of the API subscription plan.

JsonPath.Title: Start Date
JsonPath.HelpText: Subscription start date

JsonPath.Title: Expiration Date
JsonPath.HelpText: Subscription expiration date

JsonPath.Title: Units Limit
JsonPath.HelpText: Quota (total number of API units) for this subscription.

JsonPath.Title: Units Left
JsonPath.HelpText: Current API balance, i.e. number of API units left.
